headerText: The `v-file-upload` component is used to upload one or many files to your favorite backend systems.

usage.desc: The `v-file-upload` component in its basic form acts as stylish input .

props.accept: Sets the native input `accept` attribute. Accpepts multiple file types, comma separated.
props.fileDetails: Displays file details on uploader lines.
props.multiple: Sets the native input `multiple` attribute. Allows multiple files to be uploaded at once.
props.readAs: Converts each file on upload using native FileReader. Accepts `BinaryString`, `DataURL`, or `Text`
props.uploadOnSelect: Begins upload process immediately after selection of upload files.
props.uploader: Custom function run for each file on upload.
